ROM.Changelog: ### Changelog * Updated Android to 8.1.0 r_14 * Sync with the NOS source code * Updated security patch to February * Added OTA support (based on NitrogenOTA) - now you can check the lastest version from settings (System > About tablet > NitrogenOS updates) * Fixed artefacts in some media players * WiFi optimizations * Partly fixed issue when settings get crashed after turning on/off WiFi toggle * Restored touchscreen and keylayout stuff from the lastest Asus ROM * Some RIL changes * Fixed bug when CPU works only on 3 freq (max, 1026 and deep sleep). Now it works well * Improved power consumption * Added exFAT support * Ext4 optimizations * Used 64-bit Binder * Added Pixel Launcher * Fixed issue when camera app don't shown for some people (as me) * Improved system stability and smoothness
